idea:
In a world that’s addicted to visual platforms and experiences, ‘Curadio - Stories for the Curious Minds’ is a knowledge sharing and social learning place, that uses audio to create impactful learning experiences for children. It’s a unique audio encyclopedia that’s focusses on connecting inquisitive minds through curated ‘voice expressions’, which will help them to explore, express, share & learn and become mindful people. Our goal is to create ‘listening & learning’ experiences that are educative, fun and informative by building communities. Curadio uses storytelling to engage and teach the thinking minds concepts from STEM, History, Space, People, Languages, Wildlife, Nature, Indian Epics and many other subjects.


Although Curadio is an audio first platform, it's being designed for active listening, where it combines ‘Curiosity’ and ‘Learning’
name: CURADIO MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SOlAREOS RENEWABLE is one of the leading end-to-

end solution provider with total integration in EPC

Business across Power Sector. Solareos Renewable is

serving into HVAC electrical field from two decades

and into a SOLAR sector from 8 years to execute On-

grid, Off-grid and Hybrid solar projects. Our projects

include commissioning over 1.8 MWP Solar Rooftop

Projects and about 30 MW Ground Mounted


Projects. Reaching our customers’ needs to their

satisfaction is the primary motive of our organisation.

Our team of Expertise Engineers, whose dedication

to their work is distinctive. It took us perspiring years

to scale new heights and achieve a respectable

position in the industry.
name: SOLAREOS RENEWABLE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Biodegradable Plastics are facing two major pain points such as low strength and high manufacturing cost. Due to this reason current bio plastics cannot replace petroleum based plastic and all we can see around us is petroleum based non-degradable plastics. We have developed a bio-plastic which will be a complete solution to plastic industry killing both these pain point. We are using rejected milk from the dairy collection centers which is available in cheap rates and strongest natural fiber to give our plastic the desired strength. Also from July 2022, there will be strict ban in the use of petroleum based plastic, an affordable and competent bio-plastic will be a win win situation!
name: MRIDAKRANTI PRIVATE LIMITED
